name: Soulsplitter
description:
Getting to the next level as an evil wizard can be tough: gates, spikes, and the bottomless void separate you from your goal. Fortunately, you can bridge your soul with the hapless knights who are supposed to be guarding this place and watch as they copy your every move! Just beware of the red destructors: if your stretched-out soul hits one, it's sure to burn away entirely.

WASD / Arrows to move

Click to bridge/unbridge your soul with a guard

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

NOTE: The Soulsplitter.zip file is a downloadable version of the game for Windows with marginally better graphics and rain particles.
